text: The 1983 California Golden Bears football team was an American football team that represented the University of California, Berkeley during the 1983 NCAA Division I-A football season. Under head coach Joe Kapp, the team compiled an overall record of 5–5–1 and 3–4–1 in conference. ==Schedule== ==References== California Category:California Golden Bears football seasons California Football
title: 1983 California Golden Bears football team
